alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Columbiana; Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 11 at 7:14PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio, including the following counties, Belmont, Columbiana and Jefferson OH. Portions of Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Allegheny, Armstrong, Beaver, Butler, Clarion, Lawrence, Mercer, Venango, Washington and Westmoreland. Portions of the northern panhandle of West Virginia, including the following counties, Brooke, Hancock and Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 713 PM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain across the area. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, Wheeling, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Cranberry, Moon Township, New Castle, McMurray, Weirton, McKeesport, Steubenville, Hermitage, Butler, Washington, Franklin Park and East Liverpool. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
